mapper.update: update XXX_code_token set access_token = #{access_token},refresh_token = #{refresh_token},update_time = GETDATE() where org_id = #{org_id}
mapper.select: select access_token from XXX_code_token where AppKey = #{AppKey}
select AppKey,AppSecret from XXX_code_token where org_id = #{OrgId}
select t2.id,t2.FileType,t2.FileSize,t2.FileName,t2.UploadPath from SA_SaleDelivery t1,eap_attachmentinfo t2 where t1.code = #{code} and t1.id = t2.AssociateID order by t2.id asc
select mobilePhoneNo from AA_Person where code = #{code}
mapper.update: update SA_SaleDelivery set priuserdefnvc6 = 'HQ1.6' where code = #{code}
mapper.select: select priuserdefnvc6 from SA_SaleDelivery where code = #{code}
mapper.update: update SA_SaleDelivery set priuserdefnvc4 = #{flag} where code = #{code}
update SA_SaleDelivery set memo = memo + #{memo} where code = #{code}
mapper.select: select code from SA_SaleDelivery where (priuserdefnvc4 is null or priuserdefnvc4 = '') and idsettlecustomer in (1724,1723) and voucherState = 189 and voucherdate > '2022-07-24' and (priuserdefnvc6 is null or priuserdefnvc6 = '') and (idproject not in (1,2,8) or idproject is null) and (memo not like '%差异自动生成%' or memo is null)
select TOP 1 t2.code as departmentCode,t1.code as personCode from AA_person t1,AA_department t2 where t1.iddepartment = t2.id and t1.mobilePhoneNo = #{mobile}
select top 1 ISNULL(t2.name,9) AS taxRate,t3.name as unitname from AA_inventory t1,eap_EnumItem t2,AA_Unit t3 where t1.code = #{inventoryCode} and t1.taxRate = t2.id and t1.idUnitBySale = t3.id
select count(1) from AA_partner where code = #{code}
select top 1 code from AA_PartnerClass where name like '%'+#{shi}+'%' and isEndNode = 1
select count(id) from SA_SaleDelivery where SourceVoucherCode = #{Code}
select top 1 t1.id from SA_SaleDelivery_b t1,AA_inventory t2,SA_SaleDelivery t3 where t1.idinventory = t2.id and t2.code = #{inventoryCode} and t1.idSaleDeliveryDTO = t3.id and t3.code = #{code}
select top 1 ISNULL(code,#{Code}) as code from SA_SaleDelivery where code LIKE '%'+#{Code}+'%' order by id desc
